title: tournamentdan
author: tournamentdan
content: Introducing The Atlantis DAO: Pioneering Decentralized Living on the High Seas.Greetings, fellow enthusiasts of decentralization and innovation!Allow me to present a groundbreaking initiative that has been years in the making ‚Äì The Atlantis DAO. Our vision is to create a sea-steading city like none other, powered by the revolutionary Atlantis Coin (ATLC) and driven by the spirit of exploration and community.Project Overview:The Atlantis DAO aims to establish a unique living space on the sea, designed to embody the principles of decentralization, sustainability, and progress. Our journey commences with the acquisition of our first cruise ship, to be transformed into a dynamic hub for cryptocurrency conferences and entrepreneurial ventures.In subsequent stages, we plan to expand our floating city with additional docked cruise ships, floating islands, and a grand, permanent-mounted sea-dock acting as a socialization center and a thriving hub of activities for our ever-growing community.How You Can Get Involved:As we embark on this pioneering expedition, we invite you to be an integral part of our community. Your insights, support, and passion will drive the success of The Atlantis DAO. Here's how you can get involved:1Ô∏è‚É£ Join our official Discord community to connect with like-minded enthusiasts and stay up-to-date with the latest developments.2Ô∏è‚É£ Join our DAO and have a voice with your vote!3Ô∏è‚É£ Engage with our social media channels and spread the word about The Atlantis Project, contributing to the growth of our vibrant community.üèÖ Together, we can redefine the future of decentralized living and create an inspiring haven on the sea. Welcome to The Atlantis DAO ‚Äì where innovation and adventure collide!Website: https://atlcoin.orgKYC Assure Defi: https://verified.assuredefi.com/projects?recordId=recuamKeH1yDrgT4GDiscord: https://discord.gg/dc4bKGDmAtlantis DAO Invite: https://xdai.colony.io/colony/atlantisTwitter: https://twitter.com/TheAtlantisDAO?t=SZ4KlmphD2chTixAAKWwtQ&s=09ATLC token is on Gnosis.ATLC Token Address: 0xaDD455b623bE2a505ABB7094eaf47254370d9cDEToken Sale Address: 0x2327dB49Af92d468F00127AA9037334CFed3CB38Founder Token - TimeLock Contract (2 year lock): 0x022C2009D21A4317f8cf1AEf498e0738183BAD2b Let's sail into a new era of decentralization and progress!Best regards,The Atlantis DAO Team
